intro: Valencia has plenty of hotels and apartments to stay in. Below you can find some recommendations that are close to the venue (including the venue itself!), but feel free to look around.
close_title: Less than 10 minutes walk from the church
close_intro: There are a lot of good options within a 10 minute walk from church

close_options.name: Hotel NH Valencia Las Artes
close_options.location: Las Artes, Av. de l'Institut Obrer de València, 28, Quatre Carreres
close_options.description: A great option if you want to sleep in and still make it to the 12:30 Mass without breaking a sweat—or a heel.

close_options.name: Hotel NH Valencia Las Ciencias
close_options.location: Av. de l'Institut Obrer de València, 26, Quatre Carreres
close_options.description: Another solid choice—right next door, so you’ll still make it to the 12:30 Mass with time to spare (maybe even enough for a coffee and a dramatic entrance)

close_options.name: Rooms Ciencias
close_options.location: Av. de l'Institut Obrer de València, 20, Quatre Carreres
close_options.description: Only about a 8-minute walk to the church—close enough to be convenient, far enough to justify wearing comfy shoes on the way and switching to the fancy ones at the door.

close_options.name: Hotel Medium Valencia
close_options.location: Av. d'Amado Granell Mesado, 48, Quatre Carreres
close_options.description: Also, a stroll from the church. In this hotel you can enjoy the outdoor pool, gym, and lounge bar—perfect for relaxing before or after the big day.

other_intro: If you don’t mind staying a bit further from the church, here are some great options in the city centre and near the beach.

other_options.name: Barceló
other_options.location: Av. de Francia, 11, Camins del Grau
other_options.description: Barceló Hotel features a stunning rooftop terrace on the tenth floor with beautiful city views and a cozy bar. You’ll find a small but inviting pool surrounded by a sunbathing area—perfect for cooling off and relaxing during your stay in sunny Valencia

other_options.name: Exe Rey Don Jaime
other_options.location: Av. de les Balears, 2, Camins al Grau,
other_options.description: Set beside the beautiful Turia Gardens—the former riverbed that runs through the city—Exe Rey Don Jaime offers wedding guests a perfect blend of relaxation and convenience. Just a short walk from the City of Arts and Sciences, this four-star hotel combines comfort with easy access to Valencia’s top attraction

other_options.name: Hotel Valencia Center
other_options.location: Av. de Francia, 33, Camins al Grau
other_options.description: Located on the modern Avenida de Francia, just steps from the old Turia riverbed and close to the City of Arts and Sciences, Hotel Valencia Center is the perfect place to relax. Enjoy luxurious amenities like the pool, gym, and sauna—ideal for unwinding

other_options.name: Holiday Inn Express IHG
other_options.location: C/ de l'Escriptor Rafael Ferreres, 22, Quatre Carreres
other_options.description: Hotel Inn is a friendly spot just steps from the church and the City of Arts and Sciences. With free breakfast to kickstart your day, plus free parking and a refreshing pool, it’s the perfect place for wedding guests to stay energized and unwind in style!

far_options.name: Melia Plaza
far_options.location: Meliá Plaza, Pl. de l'Ajuntament, 4, Ciutat Vella
far_options.description: A privileged location in the heart of Valencia within walking distance of all the most iconic and popular attractions in Valencia. Located in the Town Hall Square, Meliá Plaza has soundproofed rooms and suites where you can rest after visiting the main attractions of the city, the leisure areas, and shopping streets. It features a fully-equipped gym, sauna, and terrace with solarium.

far_options.name: AC Hotel Colon
far_options.description: This hotel is right in the main shopping street of Valencia. If you're really into your shopping this might be a good option!

far_options.name: Hotel Las Arenas
far_options.description: If you want to stay by the beach and treat yourself, this might be your best option. This five star hotel and spa has the sea in front. Please note that the Valencia beach is  a bit far from the city centre, so you will most likely need a taxi to get back.

far_options.name: Hotel Balandret
far_options.description: A cheaper yet still great option to stay by the beach, just in front of the sea. Please note that the beach is a bit far from the city centre and venue, you will most likely need a taxi on the day of the wedding.
